column4: Hi what is a good video converter program? need to convert video files to my iPad
assuming you mean from mkv avi and not ripping from dvd
not for dvd yes, but if iam gonna rip a dvd?
ogmrip there are setting s for iDevices very nicely done there.
is it possible to hardcode a subtitle file in it?
there is a ppa for handbrake
lets keep it in channel please
Now you're ready to start installing software from the PPA!
did you sudo apt-get update and sudo apt-get upgrade?
did you enable the ppa? apt-cache search handbrake?
you need to enable the ppa, which is the jstebbins one I referred you to
as far as the handbrake output you mean
